Localization.Name: S00 Hofstede
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Laser
Size: S0
Grade: B
 
Optimal Range: 30 m
Maximum Range: 30 m
Gather Radius: 1 m
Extraction Throughput: 4 cSCU/s
 
Power Transfer: 35
 
Instability: +30 %
Resistance: -40 %
Optimal Charge Window Size: +40 %
Optimal Charge Window Rate: +20 %
Throttle min: 20%

This is the default mining head for the ROC DS slightly stronger than the Arbor

Localization.Name: ATLS GEO Module
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Argo Astronautics
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)

This bespoke mining module was designed specifically for use with the ATLS GEO.
